abstract: A list of suggestions to offer as shortcuts below the search field.
overview:
## Discussion

Provide search suggestions to help people complete their query quickly. Update the suggestions as a person types by registering for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/textDidChangeNotification] notification and implementing [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextFieldDelegate/textFieldDidEndEditing(_:reason:)].

The suggestions appear in a menu under the search field. When you assign new suggestions to this property, the suggestions onscreen refresh automatically. When a person chooses a suggestion, the system sets this property to `nil` and dismisses the search suggestions menu. Implement [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextFieldDelegate/searchTextField(_:didSelect:)] in your delegate to execute any necessary updates when a person chooses a suggestion.

If the search suggestions menu dismisses for other reasons, such as a person tapping outside the search bar, [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/searchSuggestions] doesn’t reset to `nil` immediately. The system sets [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/searchSuggestions] to `nil` only when a person interacts with search directly — for example, by typing in the search field, canceling search, or changing the search scope using the search bar’s scope bar. To dismiss the menu manually, set this property to `nil` or `[]`.
rawMarkdown:
---
source: https://developer.apple.com/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/searchSuggestions

# searchSuggestions

**Instance Property**

A list of suggestions to offer as shortcuts below the search field.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var searchSuggestions: [any UISearchSuggestion]? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Provide search suggestions to help people complete their query quickly. Update the suggestions as a person types by registering for the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextField/textDidChangeNotification] notification and implementing [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UITextFieldDelegate/textFieldDidEndEditing(_:reason:)].

The suggestions appear in a menu under the search field. When you assign new suggestions to this property, the suggestions onscreen refresh automatically. When a person chooses a suggestion, the system sets this property to `nil` and dismisses the search suggestions menu. Implement [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextFieldDelegate/searchTextField(_:didSelect:)] in your delegate to execute any necessary updates when a person chooses a suggestion.

If the search suggestions menu dismisses for other reasons, such as a person tapping outside the search bar, [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/searchSuggestions] doesn’t reset to `nil` immediately. The system sets [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UISearchTextField/searchSuggestions] to `nil` only when a person interacts with search directly — for example, by typing in the search field, canceling search, or changing the search scope using the search bar’s scope bar. To dismiss the menu manually, set this property to `nil` or `[]`.
title: searchSuggestions
